Issue.creator: nnao
Issue.summary: bootstrap.sh doesn't bypass downloading samples, Binaries and Docker Images
Issue.description: Checking out v1.1.0 branch of hyperledger/fabric-samples HEAD is now at 1252c7a... FAB-8920 Pin fabric-samples to node.js "~1.1.0" Installing Hyperledger Fabric binaries ===> Downloading version x86_64-1.1.0 platform specific fabric binaries ===> Downloading: https://nexus.hyperledger.org/content/repositories/releases/org/hyperledger/fabric/hyperledger-fabric/linux-amd64-1.1.0/hyperledger-fabric-linux-amd64-1.1.0.tar.gz % Total % Received % Xferd Average Speed Time Time Time Current Dload Upload Total Spent Left Speed {code} >
